pr_title: [Timelock Partitioning] Part 50: Wire up multi leader paxos

timeline.message: Necessary changes to support multi leader pingers
Add config option for the paxos leader mode.
Log paxos configuration when the test timelock server starts up.
Wire existing tests for multi leader.
Wire existing tests for multi leader.

timeline.bodyText: nit: renaming can reduce the diff
timeline.author: OStevan

timeline.bodyText: nit: Maybe extracting the lambda body to a function could be useful.
timeline.author: OStevan

replies.bodyText: can't be shared between single leader and multi leader I'm afraid (well it can, but the args requried and setup just don't make it worth it)
replies.author: felixdesouza

replies.bodyText: as a method such that I can refer to as a method reference feels pretty messy. I can however, make a class out of it instead, and I just pass a new instance of the class in to where I want to use it.
replies.author: felixdesouza

timeline.bodyText: nit: extract factory.components() to a local variable since its used multiple times?

timeline.bodyText: sanity check: This is safe, because this endpoint is currently unused right?
timeline.author: jeremyk-91
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -42,7 +43,7 @@
      * @param clients set of clients to check remote servers leadership on
      * @return clients for which the remote server believes that it is the leader for
      */
-    @GET
+    @POST

replies.bodyText: yep, it's completely unused/unregistered, using this client, you can't even use the endpoint since GET's can't have bodies.
replies.author: felixdesouza

timeline.bodyText: I guess this is fine as this is used only in testing, but is this intentional? Seems if we want to keep this ERROR is pretty harsh
timeline.author: jeremyk-91

timeline.bodyText: Feels a little hacky, but I guess this is from the previous tests.
timeline.author: jeremyk-91

replies.bodyText: explained offline, the TemplateVariables make the config that gets used in tests, so we can define the port to whatever sequence we want, and it will generate the right config. We just happen to continue from the previous tests.
replies.author: felixdesouza

timeline.bodyText: fine for now, I imagine this will get a lot more complicated with the auto migration mode
timeline.author: jeremyk-91

timeline.bodyText: surely this class should be something like a LeaderPingerFactoryContainer? The name is a little tricky
